feature_model.name: Text_Editor

meta.data: Feature model of a configurable text editor
200 University Ave. West, Waterloo, ON, Canada
kczarnec at swen dot uwaterloo dot ca

Krzysztof Czarnecki, Simon Helsen, and Ulrich Eisenecker. Formalizing cardinality-based feature models and their specialization. Software Process Improvement and Practice, 10(1), 2005. Special issue on Software Variability: Process and Management. http://swen.uwaterloo.ca/~kczarnec/spip05a.pdf

feature_model.feature_tree: :r editor_config(_id_0) :m backup(_id_1) :o autosave(_id_2) :m minutes(_id_3) :o backup_onchange(_id_4) :m backup_extension(_id_5) :g (_id_6) [1,1] : file_bak(_id_7) : file_bak_ext(_id_8) : file_ext_bak(_id_9) :o document_class(_id_10) :m associated_file_ext(_id_11) :o ext(_id_12) :m commands(_id_13) :o remove_blank_lines(_id_14) :o spell_check(_id_15) :o dos_unix_conversion(_id_16) :o syntax_highlighting(_id_17) :m syntax_definition_file(_id_18)
